message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $10,000. After careful consideration, I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive and tailored to recognize your appreciation for the product's potential impact on your needs. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to serving you.
